TopicHistory.title: TopicHistory
TopicHistory.description: Stores the recent topic history for each category to avoid repetition.

category.description: The category (e.g., science, technology, politics) to which the topic history belongs.

recentTopics.description: An array of the most recent topics used for the given category.

/topic_history/{category}.description: Stores the recent topic history for each category. The category name is used as the document ID for efficient retrieval.
